org.anyframe.util.system.sigar
Class SigarAccessor

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.sigar.shell.ShellCommandBase
      org.hyperic.sigar.cmd.SigarCommandBase
          org.hyperic.sigar.cmd.SysInfo
              org.anyframe.util.system.sigar.SigarAccessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hyperic.sigar.shell.ShellCommandHandler, org.hyperic.sigar.util.GetlineCompleter
public class SigarAccessor
extends org.hyperic.sigar.cmd.SysInfo

Sigar Accessor Utility Class
Simplifies the initial running environment setting of Sigar that uses JNI library.

Author:
ByungHun Woo, HyunJung Jeong

print

public static java.lang.String print(java.util.List<java.lang.String> info,
                                     int mod)
Each information is shown on Tab, and lines are separated in mod order returned as parameter so that one batch of information is written on one line.

Parameters:
info - list of information
mod - mod order
Returns:
one batch of information that is written on one line.

directRun

public static void directRun(java.lang.String registeredCmd,
                             java.lang.String[] args)
                      throws org.hyperic.sigar.shell.ShellCommandUsageException,
                             org.hyperic.sigar.shell.ShellCommandExecException
Can use basic Shell of SigarAccessor basically set when running system to immediately execute command registered as registerCommands and show results on basic console.

Parameters:
registeredCmd - (df,du,ls,iostat,free,pargs,penv,pfile,pmodules,pinfo,cpuinfo,ifconfig, uptime ,ps,pidof,kill,netstat,netinfo,nfsstat,route,version,mps,sysinfo,time ,ulimit,who, [service,fversion in case of Windows])
args - arguments
Throws:
org.hyperic.sigar.shell.ShellCommandUsageException
org.hyperic.sigar.shell.ShellCommandExecException
